name: PreflightCheck
description: Check if video is valid -- raise `InvalidVideoError` if not.

name: DetectVoice
description: Detect voice in video: find start and end timecodes of each voice segment.

name: ConvertToAudio
description: Convert video to audio segments (one per voice): prepare subtitles extraction.

name: ProcessSubtitles
description: Extract subtitles from audio segments: this process is done in parallel in the `subtitle` swimlane.

name: ConvertToSubtitles
description: Convert audio to subtitles using AI.
